body: Hey guys! So, it's true. It's been two years since I've stumbled on here while searching for a Survival Games server. I haven't posted on here much, but maybe that will change. So yeah, ask me anything. I mean it. Anything. My interests, thoughts and opinions, why I'm doing this during school hours. Make them funny, make them controversial, make them question my life. Anything. Just don't ask me where I live... please. Shoot away!

title: Jolieve/Vid's Two Year AMA!

replies.body:
As in the biscuits? Hmm, don't kill me but I've never heard of those before! But they look and sound good ^^
Do you have a favorite brand or type?
